item.title: Compile errors (advanced users only i guess)
item.dc:creator: @samuraiblood2 samuraiblood2
item.description:
@samuraiblood2 wrote:

[quote=“Itachi Uchiha, post:6, topic:15978”]you might have added something in the wrong spot :[/quote]didnt add anything and anything i added the day b4 i deleted[quote=“xRYUx, post:7, topic:15978”]This is why we back up our data, right?[/quote]i did and lost the backups :p[br][size=1]Posted at: September 23, 2006, 09:26:40 PM[/size][hr]i got it down to 2 errors client.java:14466: illegal start of expression public void fromBank(int itemID, int fromSlot, int amount) ^ client.java:22630: illegal start of expression public int EssenceMineX[] = {2893,2921,2911,2926,2899} ^ 2 errors Press any key to continue . . .

item.title: Compile errors (advanced users only i guess)
item.dc:creator: @goku_genuis goku_genuis
item.description:
@goku_genuis wrote:

@echo on
COLOR 09
title skull-scape
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_07\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_07\bin/java.exe server
runserver

copy that and paste and edit compile.bat and paste and save and run.

Read full topic

item.title: Compile errors (advanced users only i guess)
item.dc:creator: @samuraiblood2 samuraiblood2
item.description:
@samuraiblood2 wrote:

ok i got some errors well alot of errors these arent noob errors either ok here they areclient.java:14463: illegal start of expression public void fromBank(int itemID, int fromSlot, int amount) { ^ client.java:16423: illegal start of expression public void deleteObject(int objectX, int objectY) ^ client.java:16435: illegal start of expression public boolean inwildy2 = false; ^ client.java:16436: illegal start of expression public void checkwildy() ^ client.java:16459: illegal start of expression public int packetSize = 0, packetType = -1; ^ client.java:16460: illegal start of expression public int smitimer = 300; ^ client.java:16461: illegal start of expression public boolean s1 = false; ^ client.java:16462: illegal start of expression public boolean s2 = false; ^ client.java:16464: illegal start of expression public static int getprize[] = {1,2}; ^ client.java:16466: illegal start of expression public static int getprizes() ^ client.java:16496: illegal start of expression public int sbtimer = 0; ^ client.java:16497: illegal start of expression public int sb = 0; ^ client.java:16498: illegal start of expression public boolean sbloop = false; ^ client.java:16499: illegal start of expression public boolean sbscan = false; ^ client.java:16501: illegal start of expression public boolean travelboat1 = false; ^ client.java:16502: illegal start of expression public boolean travelboat2 = false; ^ client.java:16503: illegal start of expression public int traveltime = 0; ^ client.java:16505: illegal start of expression public int attempts = 0; ^ client.java:16507: illegal start of expression public boolean teleport = false; ^ client.java:16508: illegal start of expression public int teletimer = 0; ^ client.java:16509: illegal start of expression public int teleX = 0; ^ client.java:16510: illegal start of expression public int teleY = 0; ^ client.java:16511: illegal start of expression public int newheightLevel = 0; ^ client.java:16513: illegal start of expression public void teleport() ^ client.java:16530: illegal start of expression public int eY = 0; ^ client.java:16531: illegal start of expression public int etimer = 0; ^ client.java:16534: illegal start of expression public boolean showingCity = false; ^ client.java:16535: illegal start of expression public int showCityTimer = 0; ^ client.java:16536: illegal start of expression public int cityX = 0; ^ client.java:16537: illegal start of expression public int cityY = 0; ^ client.java:16539: illegal start of expression public boolean drunk = false; ^ client.java:16540: illegal start of expression public int drunkTimer = 0; ^ client.java:16542: illegal start of expression public boolean newAnimRequired = false; ^ client.java:16543: illegal start of expression public int newAnimDelay = 0; ^ client.java:16544: illegal start of expression public int newAnim = 0; ^ client.java:16546: illegal start of expression public int mageTimer = 0; ^ client.java:16548: illegal start of expression public int sidebarChangeTimer; ^ client.java:16549: illegal start of expression public int sidebarChange; ^ client.java:16550: illegal start of expression public boolean sidebarChanging; ^ client.java:16552: illegal start of expression public static int talkingNPC = 0; ^ client.java:16553: illegal start of expression public boolean process() { // is being called regularily ev ery 500ms ^ client.java:22602: illegal start of expression public int EssenceMineX[] = {2893,2921,2911,2926,2899}; ^ client.java:22603: illegal start of expression public int EssenceMineY[] = {4846,4846,4832,4817,4817}; ^ client.java:22611: illegal start of expression public int EssenceMineRX[] = {3253,3105,2681,2591}; ^ client.java:22612: illegal start of expression public int EssenceMineRY[] = {3401,9571,3325,3086}; ^ client.java:22619: illegal start of expression public boolean stairs(int stairs, int teleX, int teleY) { ^ client.java:22959: illegal start of expression public int otherpkps = 0; ^ client.java:22960: illegal start of expression public int otherkillc = 0; ^ client.java:22961: illegal start of expression public boolean ApplyDead() { ^ client.java:23025: illegal start of expression public int keepItem2 = 0; ^ client.java:23026: illegal start of expression public int keepItem3 = 0; ^ client.java:23027: illegal start of expression public int keepItemAmount = 0; ^ client.java:23028: illegal start of expression public int keepItemAmount2 = 0; ^ client.java:23029: illegal start of expression public int keepItemAmount3 = 0; ^ client.java:23031: illegal start of expression public void resetKeepItem() { ^ client.java:24310: illegal start of expression public int Publicchat = 0; ^ client.java:24312: illegal start of expression public void pmstatus(int status) { //status: loading = 0 connecting = 1 fine = 2 ^ client.java:24386: illegal start of expression public void AttackMage(int index) ^ client.java:26548: illegal start of expression public boolean healing() { ^ client.java:27989: illegal start of expression public PlayerSave loadMythgame(String playerName, String playerPass) ^ 60 errors The system cannot find the path specified. Press any key to continue . . .
i got it down to 34 but that was a dead end thx in advance
